title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Customized Social Studies Curriculum Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theory and understanding of educational methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically diagnose individual learners' prior knowledge and learning objectives using a learner profile analysis tool
Learners can generate concept maps for designing personalized learning paths based on core social studies concepts
Learners can operate a progress monitoring and feedback system for individual learners through LMS-based project management
Learners can develop assessment tools to analyze and interpret learner achievement data for verifying educational effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
